thread.title: Big News: Rajinikanth's Kabali Distribution Rights Bagged By CineGalaxy!
thread.title_full: Big News: Rajinikanth's Kabali Distribution Rights Bagged By CineGalaxy!

title: Big News: Rajinikanth's Kabali Distribution Rights Bagged By CineGalaxy!
text:
Posted by: Avinash Gopinath Updated: Tuesday, October 20, 2015, 14:13 [IST] 
The Tamil and Telugu distribution rights of superstar Rajinikanth -starrer Kabali , a directorial of Pa Ranjith, have been bagged by CineGalaxy Inc - one of the prime distributors of Indian films overseas."We are proud to be associated with this project. After distributing successful films such as 'Manam', 'Power' and 'Bhale Bhale Magadivoy', we are really looking forward to release 'Kabali' in USA," read an official statement. Kabali , which will see Rajinikanth play an ageing don, co-stars Radhika Apte, Dhanshikaa, Dinesh, Kalaiarasan and Ritwika amongst several others.Rajini, who is known for his trademark style and penchant for performing to the gallery, will be playing his age after a really long time.The makers of Kabali , which is being produced by Kalaipuli S Thanu, are currently shooting in Chennai at a studio.Also, the distribution company will soon present the much-awaited project of the new and anticipated combination of director Sukumar and actor Jr. NTR along with Manam director Vikram Kumar's 24 , starring Suriya and Samantha.
Stay tuned for further updates.
